pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic landscape scenery shot captured at night. The focus is not on a singular subject but rather on the awe-inspiring atmosphere and the immense scale of the natural spectacle unfolding. The composition emphasizes the powerful contrast between the raw energy of nature and the persistent, linear motion of human activity. A dark, stormy sky, tinged with deep purple and orange hues, dominates the frame as brilliant, forked lightning bolts repeatedly flash and strike down toward the distant horizon. Below, a highway cuts through the darkened terrain, its path defined by the continuous, glowing light trails of vehicles: bright white and yellow streaks from approaching headlights on the left, and parallel red streaks from receding taillights on the right, all converging toward the storm in the distance.
